# The `HTTPClient.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpclient">HTTPClient</a> library for issuing HTTP requests and handling the responses. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  curl&#95;easy&#95;setopt(Curl, CURLOPT&#95;WRITEFUNCTION, curlWriteFunction);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Detect supported compressed encodings and accept all.</span></CodeLine>
